procedure.name: GetAverageRatingByTrustedUser
procedure.statement: SELECT avg(rating) FROM "review" r, "trust" t WHERE r.u_id=t.target_u_id AND r.i_id=? AND t.source_u_id=?

procedure.name: GetItemAverageRating
procedure.statement: SELECT avg(rating) FROM "review" r WHERE r.i_id=?

procedure.name: GetItemReviewsByTrustedUser
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM "review" r WHERE r.i_id=? ORDER BY creation_date DESC

procedure.name: GetReviewItemById
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM "review" r, "item" i WHERE i.i_id = r.i_id and r.i_id=? AND ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY rating DESC, r.creation_date DESC

procedure.name: GetReviewsByUser
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM "review" r, "useracct" u WHERE u.u_id = r.u_id AND r.u_id=? AND ROWNUM <= 10 ORDER BY rating DESC, r.creation_date DESC

procedure.name: UpdateReviewRating
procedure.statement: UPDATE "review" SET rating = ? WHERE i_id=? AND u_id=?

procedure.name: UpdateTrustRating
procedure.statement: UPDATE "trust" SET trust = ? WHERE source_u_id=? AND target_u_id=?
